title.narrative: Production, Finance and Improved Technology Plus (PROFIT+)

description.narrative: (Zambia): The PROFIT+ activity bolsters rural livelihoods through improved agricultural productivity, market access and food security for 200,000 smallholder farmers, using a value-chain and public-private partnership approach. With FY 2015 funds, 86,250 farmers will receive production support and over 70,000 hectares of land will be placed under improved management, resulting in a 28 percent increase over FY 2014. FY 2015 investments will build the capacity of farmers to adapt to climate change through climate-smart agricultural approaches. PROFIT+ will also strengthen linkages among agricultural input providers, producers and buyers through community-based marketing agents and Farmer Service Centers. ~Through these activities, farmers will improve product quality to meet grading standards expected by retail firms and work with agro-dealers and traders to improve linkages, thus increasing overall trade in key commodities.

participating-org.narrative: Agriculture Cooperative Development International/Volunteers in Overseas Cooperative Assistance
